title: The notifications on the lock screen are not centered on my pixel 3a. They are allign to the right
content: I just got the Pixel 3a and I turned on the lock screen notification on. But instead of appearing in the middle on the screen, right under the clock - the aligned  to right side of the phone. I couldn't find any possible way to center the notifications. any idea?
